title: SLOW-COOKED SUNDAY CHICKEN RECIPE
directions: In a 3-qt. slow cooker, layer the first seven ingredients in the order listed. Combine the water, bouillon, salt, thyme, basil and pepper; pour over the top. Do not stir.
Cover and cook on low for 6-8 hours or until vegetables are tender and thermometer reads 170Â°. Remove chicken and vegetables. Thicken cooking juices for gravy if desired. Yield: 2 servings
ingredients: 1 cup cut fresh green beans (2-inch pieces)
2 bone-in chicken breast halves (7 ounces each), skin removed
